mapper.select: SELECT e.empno, e.ename, e.posname, d.dname, e.phone, e.email, e.hiredate FROM emp e INNER JOIN dept d ON e.deptno = d.deptno WHERE e.empno LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empno}, '%')
